thread.title: Manager: 2 Virginia TV station workers fatally shot on air - Nation
thread.title_full: Manager: 2 Virginia TV station workers fatally shot on air - Nation

author: boston.com
title: Manager: 2 Virginia TV station workers fatally shot on air - Nation
text:
MONETA, Va. (AP) â€” The general manager of a TV station in Virginia says two crew members were fatally shot on air in central Virginia.
Jeffrey A. Marks, general manager of WDBJ-TV, identified the two killed as Alison Parker and Adam Ward.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The station says in tweets and in a story on its website that the incident happened at a shopping center. The station says law enforcement officials are on the scene.
The station is based in Roanoke, Virginia, and serves the southwest and central part of the state. The shopping mall is just off Smith Mountain Lake.
Moneta is about 25 miles southeast of Roanoke.
